title: Establishes the New York state environmental technology institute
summary: Establishes the New York state environmental technology institute within the science and technology foundation, which shall contract with a certain local development corporation to establish such institute; the institute shall be operated collaboratively by a consortium of universities and private sector industrial partners; the institute shall address pollution prevention, remediation, and sustainable development.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to establishing the New York state environmental technology institute within the science and technology foundation
